LanguageData.AS_WAE_NobleCoat.label: AS Noble Coat
LanguageData.AS_WAE_NobleCoat.description: A combat coat worn by the nobility of ancient elves. Not only is it extremely durable, but it also compensates the wearer's combat ability.
LanguageData.AS_WAE_NobleCoatBK.label: AS Noble Coat BK
LanguageData.AS_WAE_NobleCoatBK.description: A combat black coat worn by the nobility of ancient elves. Not only is it extremely durable, but it also compensates the wearer's combat ability.
